meanings.sent1: The task was easily assignable to anyone in the team.
meanings.sent2: The homework assignments were all assignable to different students.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the laser pointer was an assignable toy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and assignable as a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is having an assignable goal to work towards.

meanings.definition: Able to be transferred to another person.
meanings.sent1: The ticket was assignable to anyone who wanted to attend the concert.
meanings.sent2: The ownership of the car was easily assignable to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: The idea of sharing ice cream was an assignable delight.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as easily assignable as passing a baton in a relay race.
meanings.sent5: The love letter was an assignable token of affection.

meanings.sent1: The funds were assignable to various projects within the organization.
meanings.sent2: The resources were all assignable to different departments.
meanings.sent3: The cake was an assignable treat for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was as freely assignable as the wind carrying seeds.
meanings.sent5: The opportunities were as assignable as pieces on a chessboard.
